title: New Water Main Disinfection
description: Before a newly installed water main can be put into service, it must be flushed and disinfected.

tasks.description: Generate a flushing plan to ensure all stagnant water is removed from the new pipe.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a sequence of hydrant operations to achieve the required flushing velocity.

tasks.description: After flushing, create a plan to inject a high concentration of chlorine into the main and let it sit for the required contact time.
tasks.expected_outcome: System calculates the required chlorine dosage and contact time.

tasks.description: After disinfection, schedule the collection of water samples to be tested for bacteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates work orders for the sampling crew.
